title: You could show Claude the file directly
surface_triggers: User describes or summarizes a document. User asks about content they have in a file. User is transcribing or copy-pasting content. User references a document, PDF, or data file.
satisfaction_triggers: User uploads or attaches a file to the conversation. User shares a document directly rather than describing it. Phrases: here's the file, I've attached, see attached, uploading, let me share the document, I'll upload, attached is.
detail: Instead of describing what's in a document or copy-pasting excerpts, you can give Claude the file directly. It can read PDFs, documents, spreadsheets, and code filesâ€”then analyze, summarize, or work with the full content. Let Claude see what you're seeing.
